title: #89: Shocking (Claire Brosseau)
itunes:title: Shocking with Claire Brosseau
description: Claire Brosseau had me over to her apartment to talk about her experience with electro-shock therapy. She was suffering from depression and her parents checked her in to a clinic that recommended shock therapy. Of course, we didn't just stick to talking about that. We covered sex, Canada, and baseball. It gets really fun.
content:encoded: Claire Brosseau had me over to her apartment to talk about her experience with electro-shock therapy. We covered sex, Canada, and baseball. It gets really fun.
